channel.title: Client will not run
channel.description:
each time i download a client it will not run
this is what it says
'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
and i want to run this cool server i found but i cant play it because of this problem... :[

item.title: Client will not run
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

Set your paths correctly and it will work.

Read full topic
